events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred downtown causing damage to both front and rear bumpers.
The claim was categorised as an auto accident based on keywords like vehicle collision and car damages.
An agent with expertise in auto accidents was assigned to oversee the claim and communicate with the insured.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and provided initial next steps to the customer promptly.
Requested photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and a copy of the driving license from the claimant.
Customer submitted all requested documents including detailed photos of the damages and official police documentation.
The auto accident claim investigation began to assess the extent of damage and verify the claim details.
Investigation confirmed the collision circumstances and the extent of the vehicle damage as presented by the claimant.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs based on the investigation findings and policy coverage.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the quick processing and the fairness of the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved following agreement on the settlement terms from both parties.
Payment was issued promptly to the customer to cover the auto repair costs as per the approved claim.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed after final payment and documented confirmation from the customer.
All claim files and communications were archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
